title.en: Prayer to Orgyen Jigme Chökyi Wangpo1

text.en: The wisdom you acquired at birth is as vast as space itself,
text.en-trans: kyé tob khyen rab namkhé khyön tar yang

text.en: And you perfected the qualities of the threefold training.
text.en-trans: labpa sum gyi jang yön ta ru chin

text.en: You who introduce all with whom you’re connected to bodhisattva activity,
To you I pray: inspire me with your blessings.
text.en-trans: solwa deb so jingyi lab tu sol
